casebody.data:
In the Matter of RADIO-KEITH-ORPHEUM CORPORATION, Debtor-Appellee, Joseph H. Basker, J. Louis Rome, and Broadway and 47th Street Corporation, Appellants. No. 455. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 20, 1935. Edwin L. Garvin, of New York City, appearing specially, etc. William Mallard, of New York City (Kenneth B. Umbreit, of New York City,, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
